overview:
Erica Swallow is a New York City-based tech and lifestyle writer and director of community at Contently, a marketplace for connecting journalists and brand publishers.

Erica’s work has been published on Mashable, CNN, Forbes, Entrepreneur, USA Today, Business Insider, American Express OPEN Forum and Pursuitist, among other sites.

Erica is an international speaker, having most recently spoken at SXSW in Austin, WOMMA Summit in Las Vegas, Social Marketers Summit in Prague, and Social Media Brasil in São Paulo.

Previously, Erica managed supported content with Mashable and before that, helped develop and implement the social media marketing strategy for The New York Times. In 2008, she was chosen out of a pool of over 3,000 candidates to blog on CosmoGirl.com about her internship at Saatchi & Saatchi, where she managed a team to create an ad campaign for a non-profit of her choice.

Erica is a graduate of New York University Stern School of Business with a Bachelor of Science in International Business and Marketing. When she’s not tweeting and blogging, she enjoys the finer things in life: friends, food, wine, chocolate, traveling and dancing.
